author: pipermerriam
content: <@755612893046636585> just realized that we're likely to have content keys on the history network that are not simple sha256 for content-id derivation.

author: pipermerriam
content: If we support retrieval of individual transactions from a block body then we will likely want that content key to map to the same content-id as the encompassing block body within which the single transaction is embedded.

author: pipermerriam
content: Cc <@843971820994822184> as this has some weird implications on the storage database since it means multiple content keys could map to the same content-id
